item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-14
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: No Hazmat markings on this pkg ripped along a side and end panel that has exposed the contents of the pkg which contains 2 x 7 oz. aerosol cans. Shrink wrap of "2 Pack" failed allowing cans to shift. Pressurized contents will be repacked as prescribed.
